decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement, 01, 02, 03, 04 received 10/12/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The artificial grass pitch shall be constructed and laid out in accordance with to FIFA Quality Concept for Football Turf - One Star accreditation.

Condition : 4 - Before the artificial grass pitch is brought into use, a Management and Maintenance Scheme (see informative below) for the facility including management responsibilities, a maintenance schedule and a mechanism for review shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning The measures set out in the approved scheme shall be complied with in full, with effect from commencement of use of the artificial grass pitch. The Management and Maintenance Scheme is expected to confirm that the pitch will be tested annually in accordance with the FA required performance criteria for clubs in the National League System
description: Conversion of the grass football pitch to 3g Artifical Turf Pitch (ATP) with perimeter ball-stop fencing and associated works
